statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 500 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15' AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 AND delivery_service = 'Express';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND transaction_date <= '2022-01-31'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 101 AND user_id = 201;
DELETE FROM revenue WHERE transaction_id = 202 AND revenue_amount = 150.25;
DELETE FROM revenue_streams WHERE income_amount > 500 AND income_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM delivery_service_info WHERE service_type = 'Express' AND rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM customer_data WHERE total_transactions < 10 AND phone_number LIKE '555%';
